Class ec.e.file.EStdio

Class ec.e.file.EStdio 

java.lang.Object
   |
   +----ec.e.file.EStdio
public class EStdio
extends Object
A convenient holder for the standard I/O pathways that, outside the Vat, are accessed off of the System class. However, inside the Vat we want to be a little more careful. Fortunately, we can treat the System class as a sturdy holder for these; all we need to do is wrap it appropriately, and that is what this class does.

EStdio()

err()
Return stderr.
in()
Return stdin.
initialize(Vat)
Initializes the standard I/O variables.
out()
Return stdout.

EStdio 
  public EStdio()

initialize 
  public static void initialize(Vat vat) throws IOException
Initializes the standard I/O variables. This should only be called once.
in 
  public static DataInputStream in()
Return stdin.
err 
  public static PrintStream err()
Return stderr.
out 
  public static PrintStream out()
Return stdout.
